code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./UserProfile.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserProfile=_ref=>{let{userProfile,updateUserProfile}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState(userProfile.name||'');const[email,setEmail]=useState(userProfile.email||'');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleSave=()=>{updateUserProfile({name,email});alert('Профиль обновлен');};const handleChangePassword=()=>{alert('Пароль успешно изменён');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u041F\u0440\u043E\u0444\u0438\u043B\u044C \u043F\u043E\u043B\u044C\u0437\u043E\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0435\u043B\u044F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"\u0418\u043C\u044F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"\u041D\u043E\u0432\u044B\u0439 \u043F\u0430\u0440\u043E\u043B\u044C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:handleSave,children:"\u0421\u043E\u0445\u0440\u0430\u043D\u0438\u0442\u044C \u043F\u0440\u043E\u0444\u0438\u043B\u044C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:handleChangePassword,children:"\u0418\u0437\u043C\u0435\u043D\u0438\u0442\u044C \u043F\u0430\u0440\u043E\u043B\u044C"})]})]});};export default UserProfile;
